item.title: How to Properly Configure Isort and Black
item.description: When you both use black and isort, which you probably should, you will notice that they both touch the import statements. When you now use both tools e.g. via pre-commit, it could happen that both tools play ping-pong with each other, as both tools modify the source code, and then report a failure. This is especially “funny”, when both tools report modified source and a failure, but basically at the end you have a git repository with no modifications, as the one tools fixes the other’s changes.
